contents: Article 27 (Budget Preparation) ① The Chairman of the Board shall prepare a budget for the next fiscal year in accordance with the provisions of Article 40 of the Public Institutions Management Act and submit it to the Board of Directors before the start of the next fiscal year. Revised July 20, 2015, November 5, 2020, ② The budget plan prepared and submitted pursuant to Paragraph 1 shall be confirmed by resolution of the Board of Directors. ③ If the budget is confirmed or changed, the Chairman of the Board shall immediately notify the Minister of Education and Planning. The details must be reported to the Minister of Finance and the Board of Audit and Inspection. Revised 2020. 11. 5.
